00014 #ifndef FREQEST_H_
00015 #define FREQEST_H_
00016 
00017 #include "spectrumsolver.h"
00018 
00019 //! Frequency estimation. Base class for MUSIC and EIG.
00020 //! \sa MUSIC, EigenVectorMethod
00021 class FreqEstimation : public SpectrumSolver {
00022 public:
00023     FreqEstimation(tfuncIC ic, bool eigenvalue_method, bool mvdl) : 
00024         SpectrumSolver(), m_eigenvalue_method(eigenvalue_method), m_mvdl_method(mvdl), m_funcIC(ic) {}
00025 protected:
00026     virtual void genSpectrum(const std::vector<std::complex<double> >& memin,
00027         std::vector<std::complex<double> >& memout,
00028         int t0, double tol, FFT::twindowfunc windowfunc, double windowlength);
00029     const bool m_eigenvalue_method;
00030     const bool m_mvdl_method;
00031     const tfuncIC m_funcIC;
00032 };
00033 
00034 //! MUltiple SIgnal Classification.
00035 class MUSIC : public FreqEstimation {
00036 public:
00037     MUSIC(tfuncIC ic = &icMDL) : FreqEstimation(ic, false, false) {}
00038 protected:
00039 };
00040 
00041 //! Eigen vector method.
00042 //! \sa MUSIC, MVDL
00043 class EigenVectorMethod : public FreqEstimation {
00044 public:
00045     EigenVectorMethod(tfuncIC ic = &icMDL) : FreqEstimation(ic, true, false) {}
00046 protected:
00047 };
00048 
00049 //! Capon MLM / MVDL.
00050 class MVDL : public FreqEstimation {
00051 public:
00052     MVDL() : FreqEstimation(&SpectrumSolver::icAIC, true, true) {}
00053 protected:
00054 };
00055 
00056 #endif /*FREQEST_H_*/
